description:
The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law`s traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashiki Kioku: Shiroi Machi no Shounen Law!
Sad Memories! Law the Boy from the White Town!
Traurige Erinnerungen – Law, der Junge aus der weißen Stadt!
Tristes souvenirs. Law, le gamin de la Ville Blanche !
Печальные воспоминания. Ло - мальчик из Белого города
ذكريات محزنة! لو الصّبيّ من البلدة البيضاء!
悲しき記憶 白い町の少年ロー!
